alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 7:47PM EDT until May 28 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg and Hazleton .Recent Rainfall across central Indiana will result in minor flooding along the white river. Additional Rainfall could produce higher crests. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY, MAY 28... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Saturday, May 28. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Flood waters cover the Hazleton softball field. Pottsville Road is underwater and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to 18.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
